Reviews.Title: Needed a microphone
Reviews.Author: Rosie One Canozzi "Gregg"
Reviews.Content: It is very difficult to find a WIRED OUTDOOR camera with a microphone.This is the one you want !!!Sony CCDip55 rated weatherproofingDid not even need to shop for a cable and power supplyPerfect

ProductInfo.Features:
700 TV Lines horizontal resolution, NTSC System. OSD Menu adjustment
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD security camera, Color DSP
Weatherproof outdoor housing, IP66, cable through bracket
Build-in 4-9mm zoom focus lens and 42 infrared LEDs for night vision
Package include: 1 of SONY Effio Camera, 1 of camera power supply, 1 of extension cable and 1 of security warning Decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL Built-in 1/3'' Sony Effio CCD OSD Menu Surveillance Security Camera Day Night Vision Outdoor Infrared 4-9mm Zoom Focus Lens 42 IR LEDs for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance with bonus Power Supply, Extension Cable and Security Warning Decal WG2
